text: I have not been able to find Guy Kawasaki's podcast feed. The usual tricks aren't working. Here's his Apple Podcasts preview page. Usually if you give that URL to the GetRSSFeed app, it returns with the address of the [[RSS]] podcast feed. This is where it took me. I viewed the XML, and it shows me an HTML page? If anyone can figure out the URL of his podcast feed, please let me know. Thanks.
